LATEST NEWS

Mark Your Calendars to Advocate at the Capitol

Join us on March 10, at the Georgia Capitol to talk with legislators about specific issues, such as addressing the disparity in pay rates between waiver programs for direct support professionals.

TalentScount

a resource for employers hiring people with autism

Know Your Right to Vote

Info on rights for voters with disabilities for Election 2016

FROM OUR DIRECTOR

October 27-29 | The Arc's National Convention & International Forum | Orlando, Florida

Registration opens in May for this once a yearincredible opportunity to network and learn with other people with autism and other intellectual and developmental disabilities! This year, we will be partnering with Inclusion International for a global event. Join the conversation as people from all over the world share struggles, successes, and hopes for the future. Learn more and register on Check back at ourthe event website to register and learn more!
